title: German Punctuality
description: Being on time is considered very important in German culture.

title: Oktoberfest
description: A famous beer festival held every year in Munich.

title: Bread Varieties
description: Germany has over 300 types of bread and is proud of its baking culture.

title: Recycling System
description: Germany has a strong focus on recycling and environmental awareness.

title: Christmas Markets
description: Traditional holiday markets with crafts, food, and decorations are popular in Germany.

title: Castles Everywhere
description: Germany is home to thousands of medieval castles, including Neuschwanstein.

title: German Engineering
description: Germany is famous for its high-quality engineering and automotive industry.

title: Beer Purity Law
description: The Reinheitsgebot is a 500-year-old law that regulates beer ingredients.

title: Wurst Variety
description: Germany is famous for its many types of sausages, or 'Wurst'.

title: The Autobahn
description: Germany’s highways are famous for sections with no speed limit.
